ygData.subject: Re: Large Container Lid Molds
ygData.msgSnippet: Heyas, Ok here is what worked for me. Scalers til 40 skewers til low 80 s banded gorgets and bracers ( and a few skewers ) til mid 90 s Masks, helms, belts to
ygData.messageBody:
Heyas,

Ok here is what worked for me.

Scalers til 40
skewers til low 80's
banded gorgets and bracers ( and a few skewers ) til mid 90's
Masks, helms, belts to 110. (will still raise ya some after that)
Tunics and sleeves at 110
Pants at 120
Capes and shoulders at 135

Nagol of Innoruuk

Michael O'Reilly wrote:

> From: Michael O'Reilly <michael@...>
>
> Hi,
>
> I had heard that making Large Container Lid Molds was a good way to get
> my skill up to 41. I was told they use the Scalar mold, but don't know
> what else to combine. Does anyone have this information?
>
> Thanks.
